text: The 2019–20 Arminia Bielefeld season was the 115th season for the German football club Arminia Bielefeld. The season lasts from 1 July 2019 to 28 June 2020. On 16 June, the club was promoted to the 2020–21 Bundesliga, returning to Germany's top tier league for the first time since 2008–09. ==First-team squad== As of 31 January 2020 ==Transfers== ===Transfers in=== Date Position Player From 1 July 2019 MF Cebio Soukou Hansa Rostock Transfer 1 July 2019 MF Fabian Kunze SV Rödinghausen Transfer 5 July 2019 GK Ágoston Kiss Haladás Szombathely Loan 11 July 2019 DF Joakim Nilsson IF Elfsborg Transfer 27 July 2019 MF Marcel Hartel Union Berlin Transfer 31 August 2019 DF Alejandro Pérez Navarro Sporting Gijón Transfer 7 January 2020 GK Oscar Linnér AIK Transfer 9 January 2020 FW Sebastian Müller 1.
